explanation: The stage direction describes a sequence of actions involving multiple characters—Fritelin and his Master appearing on stage, Fritelin moving into the audience and arranging them, and musicians playing their instruments. The longer narrative quality and description of multiple actions fit well with the 'narration' category.
stgdir: Fritelin et son Maître apparaissent sur le petit théâtre. Fritelin descend dans la foule et la fait ranger en cercle. Un joueur de viole et un joueur de rebec sonnent de leurs instruments.
